subject: remainder: server maintainence
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Reminder: The following servers will be unavailable over the next
12 - 24 hours

* bugzilla.samba.org
* wiki.samba.org
* viewcvs.samba.org
* news.samba.org
* people.samba.org
* projects.samba.org




cheers, jerry
